text: According to the student ISNA news agency, the quake on the outskirts of Dargahan, a small town on the island, injured two people. "Two people from Zinbi village were hurt but their general condition is satisfactory, '' Qeshm governor Mehdi Irannejad was quoted as saying. Houses in two villages were also reported damaged, he added.
title: A strong 5.6 -magnitude earthquake jolted part of Qeshm island in the Gulf off Iran's southern Hormozgan province at 17:06 pm (1336 GMT) on Sunday, state television reported, cited by AFP.
